achievements.name: Devoured by Darkness
achievements.description: You survived the journey through beautiful and savage dungeon.

achievements.name: Burning City
achievements.description: You saved Kenabres and acquired mysterious and thrilling powers.

achievements.name: Banner over the Citadel
achievements.description: You reclaimed a formidable crusade relic and chose your mythic path.

achievements.name: Fifth Crusade
achievements.description: You successfully led an offensive into the demon-infested lands of the Worldwound.

achievements.name: Embrace of the Abyss
achievements.description: You survived the impossible journey and returned to Golarion.

achievements.name: Heart of the Fallen Land
achievements.description: You reached the dead city of Iz and secured your place as the greatest figure in Worldwound history.

achievements.name: The Final Threshold
achievements.description: Congratulations, Commander! Your story is complete!

achievements.name: Path of the Angel
achievements.description: You chose to embrace heavenly light and righteousness.

achievements.name: Path of the Demon
achievements.description: You chose to succumb to primordial rage and evil.

achievements.name: Path of the Azata
achievements.description: You chose the path of adventure, friendship, and freedom.

achievements.name: Path of the Aeon
achievements.description: You chose to become the embodiment of cosmic law and balance.

achievements.name: Path of the Trickster
achievements.description: You just want to have fun, don't you?

achievements.name: Path of the Lich
achievements.description: You chose the forbidden power of undeath, aiming to become a lord of the dead.

achievements.name: Path of the Swarm
achievements.description: Yours is hunger.

achievements.name: Path of the Dragon
achievements.description: You were inspired by the wisdom and kindness of gold dragons.

achievements.name: Path of the Legend
achievements.description: You rejected all mythic powers to pursue the greatest goal of all â€” to be the master of your own destiny.

achievements.name: Transformation
achievements.description: Your mythic transformation is complete!

achievements.name: Mythic Choices
achievements.description: Use your mythic powers five times in dialogues to influence the world and living souls.

achievements.name: Equal to Aroden
achievements.description: Complete the game in Last Azlanti mode, playing on Core difficulty or above.

achievements.name: Spirit of Adventure
achievements.description: Complete the game playing on Core difficulty or above.

achievements.name: Test of the Starstone
achievements.description: Complete the game on Unfair difficulty.

achievements.name: Masterful Craftsmanship
achievements.description: Craft a 9th-level scroll and 6th-level potion with a single character.

achievements.name: Masterful Charge
achievements.description: Do 300 damage or more with a mounted charge attack, and kill the enemy with it.

achievements.name: The Legacy
achievements.description: Restore Areelu's magic cloak.

achievements.name: Masterful Dispel
achievements.description: Dispel every single buff from a certain Runelord you'll meet.

achievements.name: Sadistic Game Design
achievements.description: Complete the game with following settings, accomplishing the following deeds: 1) Core difficulty or above; 2) Party's speed depends on the weight you're carrying; 3) No auto level-up for PC or companions; 4) No retrain; 5) No more than 75 rests total; 6) Find and kill all optional bosses in the earliest chapter possible; 7) Defeat Khorramzadeh's army in Crusade mode; 8) Develop all four Crusade stats to their maximum potential; 9) Complete your mythic transformation.

achievements.name: Queen's Gratitude
achievements.description: Reclaim Drezen in Chapter 2 quickly and efficiently, and get praise from Queen Galfrey.

achievements.name: Great Upstart
achievements.description: Raise all four Crusade stats (Leadership, Strategy, Diplomacy, Military) to rank 5 in Chapter 3.

achievements.name: Strategic Victory
achievements.description: Develop all Crusade stats to Rank 5 by the end of Act 3; and to maximum by the end of the game.

achievements.name: Heroic Victory
achievements.description: Defeat Khorramzadeh's army in Crusade mode.

achievements.name: Divide and Rule
achievements.description: Make a demon attack another demon in Crusade battle mode.

achievements.name: Mythic Reinforcements
achievements.description: Recruit the most powerful otherworldly creatures to your Crusade armies.

achievements.name: Defender's Heart
achievements.description: Defend the tavern from attack without losing a single building to the arsonists.

achievements.name: Capitulation Is Now Moot
achievements.description: Defeat Xanthir Vang. Then provoke him. Then defeat him again.

achievements.name: Abyssal Conspiracy
achievements.description: Investigate and prevent the demodand conspiracy in the Midnight City.

achievements.name: Core of the Riddle
achievements.description: Uncover the truth behind the mysterious ancient ruins and the ghosts that guard them.

achievements.name: Your First Big Enemy
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, defeat the water elemental in the Prologue.

achievements.name: Prelate's Nemesis
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find the nabasu demon on the streets of Kenabres and kill him.

achievements.name: Blight of Drezen
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, allow Chorussina to summon a powerful demon in Drezen and defeat him.

achievements.name: End of Eternal Guard
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find and defeat the final Eternal Guardian of the Ivory Sanctum.

achievements.name: Playful Mood
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, kill the Playful Darkness in the Midnight Fane.

achievements.name: Just Pathetic
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find and defeat the Pathetic Quasit in Alushinyrra.

achievements.name: Dreadful Dragon
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, kill Melazmera, the umbral dragon of Colyphyr.

achievements.name: Ashes to Ashes
achievements.description: Playing on Core difficulty or above, find and defeat the Ashen Lady in the Ivory Labyrinth.

achievements.name: Voice from Your Dreams
achievements.description: Experience two mysterious visions before meeting the person behind them while storming Drezen.

achievements.name: All Paths Open
achievements.description: Unlock all six mythic paths before choosing one at the end of Chapter 2.

achievements.name: Memories Frozen in Time
achievements.description: Find all of Areelu's crystals containing records and watch the contents.

achievements.name: A Spark
achievements.description: It seems one of your companions is attracted to you. Where will it lead?

achievements.name: A Flame
achievements.description: You found love in the midst of the war with the Abyss.

achievements.name: Hey, I Know You!
achievements.description: Save or release the cultist scribe in the Tower of Estrod, the poor traveler attacked by vescavors, and the vrock in the Molten Scar. Then find out what happened to them later...

achievements.name: Demonic and Divine
achievements.description: Face two great entities and make your choice.

achievements.name: Truly Important Deed
achievements.description: Save the cart of booze during the Defender's Heart battle and all the courtesans at Daeran's party mansion.

achievements.name: Truly Profane Gift
achievements.description: Become the champion of the one true queen... the Fulsome Queen.

achievements.name: Next-Door Play
achievements.description: Find the Next-Door Theater in each chapter of the game and help the troupe to finally stage their play.

achievements.name: Get the Toad
achievements.description: No time to explain. Just get the toad!

achievements.name: Stay Underground
achievements.description: You killed the giant worm in its lair.

achievements.name: Hanged Man's Notes
achievements.description: You found all of the forest warden's notes.

achievements.name: Sarkoris Will Be Green
achievements.description: You cleansed the forest of all corruption.

achievements.name: Beware Still Water
achievements.description: You removed the corpse from the tree without alerting the monsters in the lake.

achievements.name: This Wall Won't Fall
achievements.description: You won the battle for Gundrun.

achievements.name: Not the Last Sarkorian
achievements.description: You completed Ulbrig's personal quest.

achievements.name: Wings of Stone
achievements.description: You found the griffon statue.

achievements.name: The Lady of the Forest
achievements.description: You met a deity of old Sarkoris.

achievements.name: Sellout
achievements.description: You exposed a traitor.

achievements.name: Elements of Success
achievements.description: You avoided a fight with the elementals in Currantglen.

achievements.name: Endangered Species
achievements.description: You and Ulbrig found all that remains of the griffons.

achievements.name: You Don't Need It Anymore
achievements.description: You found the dead cultist's stash.

achievements.name: I Wonder What's Inside
achievements.description: You opened every iron maiden in the Shadow World.

achievements.name: Stealthier Than a Shadow
achievements.description: You managed to sneak past all the shadow patrols.

achievements.name: Scattered Notes
achievements.description: You read all the notes left by the prisoner of shadows.

achievements.name: The Last Adventure
achievements.description: You performed your greatest feat.

achievements.name: The Last Spell
achievements.description: You witnessed Sendri's greatest feat.

achievements.name: The Last Shot
achievements.description: You witnessed Rekarth's greatest feat.

achievements.name: The Last Song
achievements.description: You witnessed Penta's greatest feat.

achievements.name: A Shard In a Cave
achievements.description: You obtained the shard hidden underground.

achievements.name: A Shard In a Tower
achievements.description: You found the shard hidden amongst various magical curiosities.

achievements.name: A Shard In the Shadows
achievements.description: You obtained a shard from a private collection.

achievements.name: Thaw
achievements.description: You defeated Sithhud after first weakening him.

achievements.name: Frozen Pork Chops
achievements.description: You defeated the Caretaker.

achievements.name: Odious Treasure
achievements.description: You collected every shard.

achievements.name: Prohibition
achievements.description: You defeated the beer elemental.

achievements.name: Pain And Pleasure, Indivisible
achievements.description: You made a move on a peculiar game board.

achievements.name: Glaciation
achievements.description: You defeated Sithhud on Unfair difficulty.

achievements.name: Unofficial Visit
achievements.description: You remained incognito for the whole festival.

achievements.name: Triumphant Glory
achievements.description: You won the tournament at the Echo of Fury arena.

achievements.name: The Living Fraud
achievements.description: You foiled Razmir's plans.

achievements.name: More Fun Together
achievements.description: You hung out at the festival with at least ten of your companions.

achievements.name: True Love's Kiss
achievements.description: You had an extra special date that ended with a kiss.

achievements.name: Craving the Glory
achievements.description: You defeated Aslynn at the Echo of Fury arena.

achievements.name: Seeking the Glory
achievements.description: You defeated The Opposites at the Echo of Fury arena.

achievements.name: Chasing the Glory
achievements.description: You defeated Drimo at the Echo of Fury arena.

achievements.name: Dig In!
achievements.description: You enjoyed the Kenabres festival as the Swarm That Walks.
